title: Someone messaged all my friends off my account
body: I got on just a second ago and everyone of my friends was given a link through me that i didnt send them about a riot giveaway of 3000 something rp for free for the beta ending. I need answers because it looks like my profile was either hacked or someone knows my information.

replies.body: You're not the only one, This happend to me multiple times so I changed my email and password

It definitely sounds like your account has been compromised or 'hacked' =\ . Your best bet would be to reach out to our account specialists through our [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as possible so they don't do any more damage!

I dont understand how someone messaged every single one of my friends in the matter of a couple minutes
change your password asap and contact the support they can help you with further steps to insure your accounts security.
